### Google worked with YI to build a 17 lens virtual reality camera. As virtual reality is at a short supply, because of the time and money required to make VR movies, this is one step closer to improving the virtual reality market. Many companies like Google and Facebook have all worked with virtual reality but are not able to find profit. This camera is built for filmmakers so that they can shoot films with a 360 degree view.
